changeSet.createView: SELECT dt.decision_tree_id, fv.feature_vector_id, b.solution, b.enabled, fv."values", b.created_at, b.last_used_at FROM governance_decision_tree dt CROSS JOIN governance_feature_vector fv LEFT JOIN governance_branch b ON dt.decision_tree_id = b.decision_tree_id AND b.feature_vector_id = fv.feature_vector_id
